definition: to prepare necessities (chiefly clothes) for a journey abroad
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
expenses for 治裝|治装[zhi4 zhuang1]

sentences.english: How much do you spend on beauty products on average every month?
sentences.chinese: 請問您平均每月花多少錢在治裝和美容保養產品上？

sentences.english: They equipped themselves for the expedition.
Invest in some new apparel if your image needs an upgrade.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的形象需要得到提升，可以在治裝上投資。
